name: Mom is
description:
Mom is

This game was made as a part of the 2023 Hidden Heroes Game Jam . In this game you will be able to see what kind of invisible work is done by real heroes - our mothers

Controls

 W/A/S/D- movement

 E – interaction 

Credits:

Arts - wickedpichu

Models - KarenShi, NeoCad, SaveLay

Code - YooE, RottenEagle

Level designer - noobmaster_228

GameDesigner/Team Lead - Arlecino

Worthy of mention
